attributes.action: Give NHS Workers a Fair Pay Rise
attributes.additional_details: The staff of the NHS have worked tirelessly during the pandemic to save and protect lives and many have suffered mental health issues as a result. The government should respect and reward them by showing the nation’s gratitude with a fair pay increase.
attributes.background: The chancellor announced in the budget a 1% pay increase for the NHS, this is in effect a pay cut as it is below the projected rate of inflation This should be increased to at least 3%

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Please give the NHS Covid Heroes a bigger pay rise.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577970

Recognise all members of NHS nursing profession by giving them a 12.5% pay rise
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560253
